question: Is it permissable for a man to hear a ladies voice over the radio?
answer:

with specific reference to the following :- hosting talkshows - reading out the news - creating advertisments - channel islam station promotions

A woman's voice is not awrah. However when it is used seductively etc then
it is haraam whether it be on Cii or any other place. I have mentioned this
several times on air.
For reference see: Ahkamul Quran by Mufti Shafi Saheb (RA) vol 5, page 265.

And Almighty Allah knows best.
A K Hoosen
